Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the disposition of unclaimed cremated remains of a veteran
Summary: Allows cemetery corporations to grant qualified veterans' organizations the right to receive the cremains of a veteran which has not been claimed by a relative or friend of the deceased within one hundred twenty days after cremation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the not-for-profit corporation law, in relation to disposition of unclaimed cremated remains of a veteran
